channel.title: Fix skill capes

item.title: Fix skill capes
item.dc:creator: @v_i_n_e v i n e
item.description:
@v_i_n_e wrote:

} if (wearId == 9747 || wearId ==9748){ if (p.getLevelForXP(0) <= 98) p.getActionSender().sendMessage9p. "You need 99 attack to wear this cape."); if (p.getLevelForXp(0) <= 98) return; }

item.title: Fix skill capes
item.dc:creator: @tagmaster4life tagmaster4life
item.description:
@tagmaster4life wrote:

i am trying to fix my skill cape so u would NEED 99 to wear them so i went to Equipment
and did this.If you may taking a look to help what i did wrong.the compiling is GOOD no problem there is when i tried it out and i had 99 in all stats it didn’t let me wear it (for explained i got 99 range and it would let me put it on) i look to see it the XP number was wrong but it not it the right number to each cape for the level…if any one wanna help me threw team viewer or fix the code it right there.my Skype is carlos.barrios54.

}
if (wearId == 9747 || wearId ==9748){
if (p.getLevelForXP(0) != 99)
p.getActionSender().sendMessage9p. “You need 99 attack to wear this cape.”);
if (p.getLevelForXp(0) != 99)
return;
}
if (wearId == 9750 || wearId == 9751) {
if (p.getLevelForXP(1) != 99)
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You need 99 strength to wear this cape.”);
if (p.getLevelForXP(1) != 99)
return;
}
